title: AcademyLive movie- The story of the red shoes
description:
Hello every brony,you are watching the latest news of Canterlot Royal ballet academy series , the summer is coming and celebrating for the latest pony movie, academy live present the wall paper of the first movie of academy live

Call “The story of the redshoes”

Don’t take it wrong, it’s not that orginial dark fairy tales. It’s something different.

So, let’s buy the ticket to the theater, and entering the magical new world of CRBA series.

 

==========This is the place where we started===============

 

filmname:  “The story of the redshoes”

 

=============================================

 

Canterlot Royal ballet academy

It’s a place where many girls had ever dreamed,

Even in summer

 

The school is off, many ladies finished the long,hard practice, and with their childish heart and Pleasant on their lovely little faces going out to play.

But even though, there are some ladies are looking forward to join the summer special activity of the academy, and the “some” are Coco pommal, and with her friends

Colgate, a hard working girl know very much about medical ,who very admire Fleur de lis, the legand of the academy history.

Lyra, the silly ,funny but fill with hidden sensitive and motive energy

Bonbon, lyra’s partner, a smart companion

 

Every summer, Canterlot Royal Ballet Academy will have a period that can let the mare’s branch and colt’s branch can join together for practicing ballet , study exchange,and most of all, make friends.

And this summer, Coco and her friends joinging this plan too, every time the school will decide is mare come to colt’s branch or else. And this time, they can have the chance to see the colt branch of CRBA.

 

The colt’s branch of CRBA were located in the south side of Canterlot, almost close to the mountainside. This place were used to be a great forest ,and fill with many kinds of legand and myth, after hundred of years passing, the forest were become a plain with houses.

 

Colt school isn’t that fantasy like the mare’s branch did, it looks majestic , with marble white and golden color lines, like some kind of late Baroque style palace from Vienna. But it’s also very beautiful too.

 

The first thing they have to do after they entering the school, is to find their “partner”

The one who can practice Pas de deux with.

Bonbon,Lyra,and Colgate are finding their partner, but Coco just can’t not descide.

The night in their dorm’s room. Coco talking about she have no any feeling with the boys here, she don’t know how and why she needs a partner, but three girls try not to let Coco give up, and invite her to join the first Pas de deux class tomorrow.

 

After that day in Class, every company are practice their beautiful dance, only Coco sitting on the corner, quietly flapping her little tutu skirt.

Than, a lated colt student coming to class. He is also the one who haven’t find his partner. So the passionate teacher putting Coco with him to be the practice partner.

 

This Colt is a earth pony, not so handsome, but not looking bad too, every part of him are only soso, and with a silly glasses and with a silence face and a emerald neckless on his neck. But susprisly , when he starting his hoove step, the movtive was so perfect, Coco was so susprise that she accidentally step on his hoove, twice.

 

After class, the colt not even say anything, lefting Coco alone and gone from the end of the hallway.

Coco ask her teacher about that boy. The teacher said his name is Brian.

The ballet genius of the academy, even the forth grade can’t not reach, but he very silence, and barely have friend, just left alone.

 

After school,Coco’s friends invite Coco to a cloth store not far away, but Coco suddenly saw Brian going to the back garden of the school, curiosity let her lie to her friends about she have to do something first, and going to the back garden.

 

The back garden of the academy was call “Diamina”, the name means “flower and lune’s goddess” Coco came to the garden, and saw Brian sitting on the corner , looking at something. She come closer , and see Brian holding his emerald neckless , looking at a small little flower with a warm little white light

 

“What’s this?”she askd

“Sylines.”he said “means “heart”, in flower’s language. ”

“a nice name.” she said, but actually she never know this kind of flower

 

And than , they talking about it. He said before he got this emerald from his mother before she pass away, it’s the stone full with nature energy, and can sence the magic of Sylines, to talk with nature. And the sylines have a very long ,forgotten myth about, it said the day where this land used to be only with Ranker, a herd of an Elves, when the day of middle summer, a nameless fire enter the forest and buring everything, the Elven lord and queen using the half part of the emerald to let the fire fade away. But the queen were losing all the energy and die, after her pass away. Elven lord using  the queen’s lefted energy and the half emerald, to create those flower, and protect the forest.

 

At first, they were just talking, Coco and Brian.

And at the night, when beautiful and cool moon that luna had raisen on the high side of the sky, you can see two good friends sitting each other, with a can of cola. Talking about many things.

Before they leave, they performd a perfect pas de dus (and this time Coco didn’t step on his hooves) under the moon light

 

After a few days, when Coco talking about her new friend Brian with three girls, Colgate suddenly have a bad feeling, and after tomorrow, she talk with Coco.

Colgate know many medical knowledge, and she knew this magic plant “Sylines.”

 

“it’s a flower with white petal, but the juice is blood color, can cause illusion and harm”

 

Colgate think Coco made some “bad friend”and wish Coco to leave Brian, but Coco was confused about, and she start to wonder if her friends were jealous…

 

After few days. the academy just release a big news

 

The grand “summer night gala festival ” was ready to beging, it’s a biggest festival of the academy , holded every four years, they will gather in Diamina garden and having dance party. But it’s was not actually a “party”, more like a dancing competition. And the academy’s teacher and many great international artist will join this great feast too.

For the most well performed pair will become the queen and king of the party, and will be the main character of the academy’s next play on Equestria Imperial Grand National Hall , Princess Celestia and Fleur de lis will be there.

 

This is a very great opportunity for all colts and mares, and Coco and her friends were talking about it either, but they didn’t know, it was just the overture, of the crack of their friendship….

 

days after day, their friendship become bit sour.

First is Lyra and bobon didn’t show up in their together practice, and Colgate find out Coco was still hanging with Brian, when Colgate coming to the corner where the Syline are, she saw a big fire buring in front of her, fear about what she saw, she cut off the flower, and because of her medical knowledge and experience , she cut if off safely, but after that Coco find out.

They fight finally had started.

 

After that, Coco didn’t come back to the dorm

She talking with Brian about it. Brain can’t let Coco be happy, but than he came up with an idea, he take Coco to a place, and buy her a lovely little box, and feel comfortable for the smile on Coco’s little face.

 

 

“when you miss me, just wear it.”he said.

 

 

after tomorrow, Brian didn’t show up in class.

In fact, he’s been lost for a week…

 

Coco very worry about him, and than his word appeared, she open the box.

It was a pair of world most beautiful, red ballet shoes ,shining under the moonlight.

Coco wear the shoes, and than she start to dancing , she feel so susprise about she can perform the same dancing skill as Brian did, and than after her dance, she fall asleep.

 

On a strenge pony’s hooves.

 

He put Coco on a gondola that already set on the river side, and using the river, enter the forest that none ponies had ever enter…

 

Coco woke up, find out her ling on the flower field in the middle of the forest, and there’s a great tree standing on the field, surroing with magical light spot.

 

The stgenge that take her in , took off his dark cloak

It’s Brian!

 

He invited Coco to dance. They performed a great dance under the magic , suddenly, the field blooming with Sylines flower, and sending some white light gather in Brian’s body.

Coco was so shock that she almost fall, Brian beomce a tall, unbelieveable handsome, and elegant deer ! not orginial deer, it’s an Elf!

And the emerald neckless become his golden crown on his velvet.

He smile to Coco, and tell her his true name

 

“Brian..?”Coco asking

“used to be… my real name is… Oberon .”he said

He said he is the last Elven prince of the Elf kind, he spanding most of his life on protect this last forest , and what Coco wear, have the same name of the flower, Sylines. The red shoes, which is the symbol of the Elven queen.

Oberon wish they both can be the best on Summer night gala festival, so they will become king and queen, than wish Coco to marry him and become the new Elven queen

But Coco was so shock and said she only see him as friend, and this makes the elven prince heart broke, Coco wish he can back to school and still be Brian. But Oberon refused, he using a portal to send Coco back , but the deep love bitter inside . Oberon set a curse

Coco will never can get rid of the shoes and keep dancing

 

And the curse starting the nightmare of Coco

 

The day on class, her teacher was so impress about Coco performance, But Coco was so afrid because this was not her mind making it. And after the class, Coco’s shoes suddenly became wild and crushing to the bookcase.

That day’s afternoon, when Colgate with her friends coming to Coco, trying to apology about the thing they had done, than find out Coco have problem. They tring to remove the shoes but it was in vain. So they decide to come after Oberon.

 

But for her friends can not enter the edge of the forest, Coco came to Oberon alone.

Oberon said only when her become the queen, she can remove the curse.Coco accept it with bitter tears. But in one condition,

 

Only Coco and Brian together be King and queen in gala festival, than they will get maried

 

Oberon hold her in his hooves so gently and with the tears on his blue gem eyes,  hope she understand about he’s love, and he will love her forever.the bird on the forest put a beautiful white wedding veil with flower crown.

 

After coming back from the forest, she talk to her friend about those thing, and Bonbon said if we wanna help Coco we must learnd more about Oberon, so Bonbon and Lyra gone to library and Eoogle for searching information. Colgate monitor Coco and Brian’s situation.

 

Coco still wearing the red shoes, for some reason, she feel sorry about Oberon, and still wearing it even it’s not stuck in her hooves now. One day in the garden, Oberon let Coco wear the emerald neckless, and let Coco feel the voice of beautiful nature.whcich is wishing them to be happily ever after. Under the moon light, the elven prince kiss on Coco, the new elven princess’s little sweet lips.

 

Coco’s friends also having some big explore.

They find out the legand of what Coco’s hearing from Oberon, the truth is the elven magic was restore in the red shoes, it was another form of Sylines, it had been set a prophecy that the day when the elven lord and queen had raise again, and the forest will reborn once again. And the day was actually in middle summer,

The same day of gala festival

 

In another words. The day when Oberon and Coco become king and queen, this school, or even the half of Canterlot will be destroyed.

 

To prevent this, Colgate ,Bonbon and lyra planing something ….

 

The day of mid summer night, Diamina garden is pretty and fill with beautiful dresses’s ballet princess and prince, Oberon was in Brian’s form appear too, but than he was been deceive by Bonbon and lyra to some place do some funny stuff whatever.

Yet he find out something wrong, and storming back to the festival, but the dacning was over, and the king and the queen were standing on the stage .

Is Colgate and her partner.

This makes Brian so angry , he using the stunning wave to make every pony silence, than he slowly walking to Colgate…

And very carefully took of her mask.. and wig…

 

It’s not Colgate,

But Coco. With a face of tears…

 

“I’m sorry.”she said

 

Suddenly, she rush up and took the emerald of Obeon’s emerald neckless. And using the emerald power to flash away. Losing the emerald power, Brian’s form shatter and truned back to Oberon,

 

every ponies shocking sound and the feeling of being betrayed by his loved drive him mad ,Oberon release the Syline power, suddenly, all flower start bleeding ,and become red, the same color of the red shoes, and become thousand of butterfly with blade wings attacking the festival!

 

Every poines start running and shooting, Oberon storming back to the forest , but he didn’t notice a pony accidentally knock down a torch and causing a fire, starting to buring the forest!

 

Losing the emerald power, so Coco’s friends can enter the field of the forest and to the place of the field in the middle of forest, Coco was trying to use the emerald power talking to the forest please not to hurt the innocent, but the forest answer Coco that the once had hurt were back.

Before starting to figue out what’s that mean, Oberon coming back! Coco’s friend stand up and protect her!Lyra holding a woddstick and warn Oberon that she used to be the member of Kendo ,but Oberon shield down Lyra’s attack and throw her away. Than bonbon and colgate trying to help but they were down too. Coco cry out stop hurting each other, but than Oberon put her friends inside the water forcing Coco to marry him or they will drain, Coco silence, and close to Oberon, she kiss on Oberon and crying, her cry was so deep and hard that Oberon start feel sorry about that.

And than Colgate coming ,telling Oberon what Coco actually feel, so as Bonbon and Lyra.

Seeing the true voice of Coco’s heart, the elven prince suddenly realize that Coco was not belong in here, but her friends in front of him.

He sigh, and return all the magic of the sylines.

 

Than the burning smell coming, the forest was on fire!

 

Oberon said he will do what his mother had done, using the last part of the emerald to extinguish the fire , and the red shoes will tale her and her friends out, Coco ask what about him, Oberon kiss on Coco and said

 

“when you miss me, just wear it.”he said.

 

Suddenly, all sylines flowers all become white again, and putting all magic on Coco’s shoes, the power sending her and her friends into a portal, than Oberon burning together with his beloved forest.

 

When Coco awake, she saw they were on the academy, and the firefighters were helping the wounded and extinguishing the fire of the school and the forest.
Coco looking at her red shoes, this time, she can took it off like the normal shoes, but the beautiful redcolor had turned to normal white

”he’s not a bad guy…”Coco said. “he just…need some love…” her friends wiping her little tears on her face.

 

Summer end so soon, the festival is over, and Colgate finally become the queen, and got the chance she always dreamd of, face to face with Fleur de lis.

And as well , the exchange student will be over soon.

At last day before they come back to their own academy, Coco standing on the place where Brian used to be in the corner of the garden.

She memory about Brian’s words, and wear the red shoes .

 

Suddenly she saw on the other side there is another colt standing in the garden, she come closer and find out it’s a small little seeding of the new Syline.and the colt…somehow that her remind of Oberon….

 

“do I know you… you seems….fimiliar..?”the colt ask with confuse

 

“I don’t believe we do..” said Coco with the smile

“but… would you like to dance?”

She invited.

 

The colt actually didn’t know what’s going on, but he accepted.

 

Under the sunshine, another great performance took place in the garden of Diamina, the place with forest elven legand. Her friends smiling to see this view, and the flower and forest were reborn again, with true natural beauty

 

 

“for I’m the elven queen.” She said in her heart..

 

 

-THE END-

 

================================

 

Story/ Sean.M
